data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vadthanarat, Santhiti, Lumyong, Saisamorn, Raspe, Olivier (2019): Cacaoporus, a new Boletaceae genus, with two new species from Thailand. MycoKeys 54: 1-29, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.54.35018, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.54.35018
